title: Diamond Grandeur: Exquisite Bridal Haaram - Jan-11779
materials: D.mq(1/10):-1.71(19)). All diamonds are of GH color grade and VS clarity.
features: This contemporary Haaram features a cascading design with meticulously set diamonds. The piece showcases a central floral motif that radiates outwards, leading to a delicate arrangement of pear-shaped diamonds resembling teardrops or leaves. The diamonds are expertly set in a pave style, maximizing sparkle and brilliance. The design blends modern aesthetics with a subtle hint of traditional South Indian artistry.
colors: Predominantly white and clear due to the white gold and diamonds
offering a timeless and elegant appeal.
occasions: and high-profile events. Its modern design also makes it suitable for sophisticated evening wear.
description: This diamond haaram is a statement piece that combines unparalleled craftsmanship with exceptional diamond quality. Its versatile design allows it to be worn with both traditional silk sarees and modern gowns. The piece is a valuable investment, offering both beauty and enduring value. Its dazzling sparkle and exquisite design will undoubtedly make you the center of attention. The delicate pear-shaped diamond arrangement gives a light and graceful feel, enhancing the overall elegance.
